text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @ICEgov .

Even CROWDED Hong Kong has less than 2 Covid-19 dead per million. Only 10 victims for 7 million, which would be a rate in America of only 473 dead instead of our 139,999 Dead.

For every one of the 2000 MS-13 arrested, 
Trump's poor Coronavirus response killed 70 Americans.

. https://t.co/p3cgH2WHmd

entity.name: Hong Kong declares coronavirus outbreak an 'emergency'
entity.description: The city’s leader, Carrie Lam, also extended school holidays until February 17, suspended official visits to mainland China and said this year’s Hong Kong Marathon would not take place.
